main_definition: Travelers refer to individuals or groups who are journeying from one place to another, typically by transportation means.

meanings_and_examples.definition: People who frequently travel for leisure and exploration
meanings_and_examples.example: The group of European tourists were well-known as worldwide travelers enjoying various cultures.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Passengers on a bus, train, or other forms of public transportation
meanings_and_examples.example: As the subway train arrived at the station, several groups of young travelers eagerly boarded it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Historical figures who have embarked on significant journeys or voyages
meanings_and_examples.example: Christopher Columbus and his crew were renowned as travelers when they sailed across the Atlantic Ocean in 1492.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Individuals involved in organized groups for promoting tourism, cultural exchange, or other purposes
meanings_and_examples.example: The ambassador was a key figure among international travelers who helped foster better relationships between countries.
